channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Billy Joel sells part of Long Island estate: A 5,500-square-foot gatehouse on 5 beachfront acres for $8.5 million
item.description: To call it a gatehouse might be an understatement: This property has two kitchens, a pool and an extra apartment.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Short-term Treasury yields hold near 6-month trough amid recession chatter
item.description: Bond yields were mixed across the curve early Tuesday as investors continued to take cover in government debt as concerns about a U.S. economic slowdo...

item.title: ‘Is it finally time to freak out?’ I’m in my 50s and worried about the $650K in my 401(k).
item.description: “The stock market is in a downward spiral.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: I viewed a $600K house. I discovered it has an unsafe kitchen extension. Do I tell the selling agent?
item.description: “The next-door neighbor was going to buy it, but the seller warned him off.”
